participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, with a love for nature and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I prefer the night to the day, but I love sunshine. I can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog. I drive more than an hour each way to work. I love dragons. I am a grandparent at 44.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and hardworking, with a passion for the outdoors and a love for simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I love to fish. I eat lots of pancakes and syrup. I cut down trees very fast, because I have a large ax. I am a lumberjack.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for work?
I'm a lumberjack!
Wow, that's cool! I've never met a lumberjack before.
It's a good job. I get to work outside and I'm always learning new things.
That's awesome. I love working outside too. Do you have any favorite stories from your work?
Sure, I have a few. One time, I was cutting down a tree and it fell on a house.
Oh no! Was anyone hurt?
No, thankfully no one was hurt. But it was a close call.
That's scary! I'm glad no one was hurt.
Yeah, me too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to fish. I also like to cook and eat pancakes.
I love to fish too! What's your favorite fish to catch?
I like to catch bass. They're a good fight and they taste great.
I agree, bass are delicious. I love eating them fried.
Me too! They're the best.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a lumberjack?
I love the fresh air and the exercise. I also love the challenge of the job.
That sounds really great. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks, me too.
